alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN PASCO...PINELLAS AND NORTHWESTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 452 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pebble Creek to near East Lake-Orient Park to Macdill Air Force Base. Movement was west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Temple Terrace, Seminole, New Port Richey, Lutz, Holiday, Brandon, St. Petersburg, Palm Harbor, South Highpoint, New Port Richey East, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Land O Lakes, Egypt Lake-Leto, and Greater Carrollwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
